snippet.title: Paulis Adventure Island - Trailer iOS/Android/UWP
snippet.description:
Hop, dash, fly, and float your way through rolling hills, mysterious forests, dark caves, ancient temples, and more in this epic 2D side-scrolling platformer! Explore and collect all the stars in each level for extra lives, but beware of dangerous creatures: One false step, and you’ll get knocked back to square one!

iOS: https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/paulis-adventure-island/id1193003769?ls=1&mt=8
Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.hejvisj.paulisadventureisland
UWP: https://www.microsoft.com/store/apps/9p83k78kmwbv
Amazon: https://www.amazon.com/Hejvisj-Paulis-Adventure-Island/dp/B01GN573PA
Website: http://hejvisj.com/

Music credits:
"Call to Adventure" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com) 
Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 3.0
http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/
